CustomField.description: Identifies if the Task resulted in Customer being Reached
CustomField.formula: ISPICKVAL( SalesAction__c ,'Call Reached') || ISPICKVAL( SalesAction__c ,'Called Us') || ISPICKVAL( SalesAction__c ,'Visited Us') || ISPICKVAL( SalesAction__c ,'Emailed Us') || ISPICKVAL( SalesAction__c ,'Social Media Reached')
CustomField.label: Is Task Call Reached
